about_the_game:
Become a wizard apprentice, attend classes to train your magical skills and free the world from the curse that threatens innocent creatures.
Meet other apprentices while exploring the academy and uncover its secrets at your own pace.



TRAIN YOUR MAGICAL SKILLS BY ATTENDING CLASSES: In the botanic class, attend your garden to grow and harvest fresh vegetables.
Catch and collect spell-creatures in the spell class. Learn other skills such as how to brew powerful potions, craft charms and heal creatures.



BEFRIEND OTHER APPRENTICES: Meet a cast of unique characters and together explore the academy to uncover all its secrets. Be a part of their stories and form great relationships.



PERSONALISE YOUR CHARACTER AND YOUR CAT: You can change the appearance of your character and your spirit companion as well!
Enjoy chilling with your spirit companion, form a strong bond with them by giving them loving pats, treats and playing games. Your cat will always be there for you.



OUTSIDE THE ACADEMY: Explore the surroundings of the academy and discover all its secrets or just relax while practising bug catching, fishing, foraging or cooking.

name: Kitori Academy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kitori Academy is a life simulator where you live the adventures of a wizard apprentice with your spirit companion. Train your magical skills and learn how to brew potions, grow vegetables and catch spells to challenge the curse that lurks in the world.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
